title: Son asks mom a favor - conclusions

content.description:
Directions: You will now listen to an audio selection. First you will have time to read the questions silently. Then you will hear the selection. You may take notes as you listen. Your notes will not be graded. After listening to each selection, you will have time to answer the questions. For each question, choose the response that is best according to the selection.
You will listen to a conversation between a mother and son.
content.question: Cosa decidono alla ﬁne madre e ﬁglio?

choices.label: Che la madre accompagnerà i ragazzi a Bologna
Che i ragazzi resteranno a casa
Che i ragazzi passeranno la notte a Bologna
Che la madre andrà a Bologna da sola

content.answer: Che i ragazzi passeranno la notte a Bologna
